articles.description: The Turkish club's Champions League tie against PSG last week had to be suspended after Sebastian Coltescu allegedly used a racist remark to identify Pierre Webo.
articles.content:
Istanbul Basaksehir forward Demba Ba has denied claims that the row with the Romanian fourth official who caused a racism storm in the Champions League last week has been resolved.
The Turkish club'… [+3634 chars]

articles.author: Freddie Keighley
articles.title: Man Utd transfer round-up: Sporting wonderkid targeted as Daniel James linked with exit - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Red Devils are reportedly eyeing a move for a Portugal youth international already rated at £40million, while out-of-favour winger James is linked with a familiar club
articles.content:
Manchester United boss Ole Gunnar Solskjaer will be boosted by the arrival of Amad Diallo from Atalanta in January, pending the 18-year-old securing a work permit.
The Ivorian will hand Solskjaer an… [+3500 chars]

articles.author: Phil Kirkbride
articles.title: Niels Nkounkou set for more Everton squad pain after Carlo Ancelotti declaration - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Nkounkou looked set to deputise for the injured Lucas Digne but has missed out on every Everton squad since
articles.content:
Carlo Ancelotti says he will continue to overlook Niels Nkounkou for the time being because he "prefers more experienced players".
